email_template.subject: Emergency Relief for Haiti: 31.3% Funded - Your Impact is Growing!
email_template.html_content:
Dear HFRP Supporter,

We have incredible news to share about our "Emergency Relief for Haiti" campaign!

📊 Progress Update

  • Goal: $75,000.00
  • Raised: $23,450.00 (31.3%)
  • Donors: 156 amazing supporters
  • Remaining: $51,550.00

Providing immediate emergency relief to families affected by recent disasters in Haiti

Thanks to donors like you, we're making real progress! Every donation brings us closer to our goal and brings hope to families in Haiti.

🤝 Continue Supporting This Campaign

With gratitude,
The HFRP Team
